title: Frameworks Schema
description: Schema for external security framework definitions

id.description: Unique framework identifier used in mapping references

fullName.description: Full official name of the framework

version.description: Framework version. Supports multiple versioning schemes: semantic versioning (e.g., '5.0.1'), year-based (e.g., '2025'), or null for unversioned frameworks

lastUpdated.description: Date framework was last updated (YYYY-MM-DD format)

techniqueUriPattern.description: URI pattern for individual techniques (use {id} as placeholder)

documentUri.description: Direct URI to framework document or specification
